name: BLACK / LIGHT
description:
Traverse the tunnels of BLACK / LIGHT and find the reward at the end. :) This game was built for Ben Bonk's Game Jam 3. The theme was "Two Sides", which we met by dividing the world and the player attacks in two, forcing thoughtful positioning.  It is not a full game, but we tried to make it as challenging as possible in the time given. 

A thing to note for any confusion is that 'light' enemy take dark damage from the player's dark bullets, and 'dark' enemies take light damage. The light and dark damage only comes out of one side of your body.


Created by Oliver Freeman and Andrew Jones
Link to repository here: https://github.com/FakeOllie/LightAndDark
